verses.verse: וַתִּשְׁלַם֙ <WH7999> was finished כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> Thus all the work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> made שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> that Solomon לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> for the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD ס וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> brought שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> and Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁ֣י ׀ <WH6944> had dedicated דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> that David אָבִ֗יו <WH1> his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> and the silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> and the gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> and all the instruments נָתַ֕ן <WH5414> put בְּאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> he among the treasures בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God פ

אָז֩ <WH227> Then יַקְהֵ֨יל <WH6950> assembled שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Then Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> and all the heads הַמַּטּ֜וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes נְשִׂיאֵ֧י <WH5387> the chief הָאָב֛וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <WH5927> to bring up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעִ֥יר <WH5892> out of the city דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David הִ֥יא <WH1931> which צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> which [is] Zion

וַיִּקָּהֲל֧וּ <WH6950> assembled אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> themselves unto the king כָּל־ <WH3605> All אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> Wherefore all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֶּחָ֑ג <WH2282> in the feast ה֖וּא <WH1931> he הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <WH7637> which [was] in the seventh

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> came כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> And all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> took up הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and the Levites אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> the ark

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> And they brought up אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרוֹן֙ <WH727> the ark וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> vessels הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> and all the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> that [were] in the tabernacle הֶעֱל֣וּ <WH5927> bring up אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> these did the priests הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> [and] the Levites

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Also king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הַנּוֹעָדִ֥ים <WH3259> that were assembled עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> with לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> unto him before הָאָר֑וֹן <WH727> the ark מְזַבְּחִים֙ <WH2076> sacrificed צֹ֣אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <WH1241> and oxen אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> could יִסָּפְר֛וּ <WH5608> which could not be told וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִמָּנ֖וּ <WH4487> nor numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> brought in הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <WH3548> And the priests אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמ֛וֹ <WH4725> unto his place אֶל־ <WH413> into דְּבִ֥יר <WH1687> to the oracle הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house אֶל־ <WH413> to קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> into the most הַקְּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כַּנְפֵ֥י <WH3671> [place even] under the wings הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <WH3742> of the cherubims

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <WH3742> For the cherubims פֹּרְשִׂ֣ים <WH6566> spread forth כְּנָפַ֔יִם <WH3671> [their] wings עַל־ <WH5921> over מְק֖וֹם <WH4725> over the place הָאָר֑וֹן <WH727> of the ark וַיְכַסּ֧וּ <WH3680> covered הַכְּרוּבִ֛ים <WH3742> and the cherubims עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark וְעַל־ <WH5921> over בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> and the staves מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> thereof above

וַֽיַּאֲרִיכוּ֮ <WH748> And they drew out הַבַּדִּים֒ <WH905> the staves וַיֵּרָאוּ֩ <WH7200> were seen רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> [of the ark] that the ends הַבַּדִּ֤ים <WH905> of the staves מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָרוֹן֙ <WH727> from the ark עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַדְּבִ֔יר <WH1687> the oracle וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> could יֵרָא֖וּ <WH7200> but they were not seen הַח֑וּצָה <WH2351> without וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> are there עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> And there it is unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אֵ֚ין <WH369> There בָּֽאָר֔וֹן <WH727> [There was] nothing in the ark רַ֚ק <WH7535> but שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> save the two הַלֻּח֔וֹת <WH3871> tables אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> put מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> which Moses בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <WH2722> [therein] at Horeb אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where כָּרַ֤ת <WH3772> made יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> when the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> with בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [a covenant] with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> when they came out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt פ

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become בְּצֵ֥את <WH3318> were come out הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> And it came to pass when the priests מִן־ <WH4480> from הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy כִּ֠י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> [place] (for all the priests הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֙ <WH4672> [that were] present הִתְקַדָּ֔שׁוּ <WH6942> were sanctified אֵ֖ין <WH369> without לִשְׁמ֥וֹר <WH8104> [and] did not [then] wait לְמַחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <WH4256> by course

וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> Also the Levites הַמְשֹׁרֲרִ֣ים <WH7891> [which were] the singers לְכֻלָּ֡ם <WH3605> and all לְאָסָ֡ף <WH623> all of them of Asaph לְהֵימָ֣ן <WH1968> of Heman לִֽ֠ידֻתוּן <WH3038> of Jeduthun וְלִבְנֵיהֶ֨ם <WH1121> with their sons וְלַאֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <WH251> and their brethren מְלֻבָּשִׁ֣ים <WH3847> [being] arrayed בּ֗וּץ <WH948> in white linen בִּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4700> having cymbals וּבִנְבָלִ֣ים <WH5035> and psalteries וְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <WH3658> and harps עֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> stood מִזְרָ֣ח <WH4217> at the east end לַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar וְעִמָּהֶ֤ם <WH5973> with כֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> priests לְמֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> and with them an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> and twenty [מַחְצְרִרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֖ים <WH2690> blow ק) בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֽוֹת׃ <WH2689> trumpets

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כְ֠אֶחָד <WH259> [were] as one [לַמַּחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (לַמְחַצְּרִ֨ים <WH2690> blow ק) וְלַמְשֹֽׁרֲרִ֜ים <WH7891> and singers לְהַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <WH8085> to be heard קוֹל־ <WH6963> sound אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> to make one לְהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> in praising וּלְהֹדוֹת֮ <WH3034> and thanking לַיהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD וּכְהָרִ֣ים <WH7311> and when they lifted up ק֠וֹל <WH6963> [their] voice בַּחֲצֹצְר֨וֹת <WH2689> with the trumpets וּבִמְצִלְתַּ֜יִם <WH4700> and cymbals וּבִכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> and instruments הַשִּׁ֗יר <WH7892> of musick וּבְהַלֵּ֤ל <WH1984> and praised לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [saying] For [he is] good כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> for his mercy וְהַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> that [then] the house מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> was filled עָנָ֖ן <WH6051> with a cloud בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [even] the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָֽכְל֧וּ <WH3201> could הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> So that the priests לַעֲמ֥וֹד <WH5975> not stand לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> to minister מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> by reason הֶעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> of the cloud כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> had filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> for the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God פ
